item.description: “Quid vitae sectabor iter?” — David Wootton “Sapiens can cooperate in extremely flexible ways with countless numbers of strangers.” ― Yuval Noah Harari “How long is forever?”, “Sometimes, just one second.” ― Lewis Carroll “Not a single one of the cells that compose you knows who you are, or cares.” ― Daniel Dennett “Time is just a passage of entropy” ― Carlo Revoli “Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I’m not sure about the universe.
